metadata.title: CVE-2023-7192 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: A memory leak problem was found in ctnetlink_create_conntrack innet/netfilter/nf_conntrack_netlink.c in the Linux Kernel. This issue mayallow a local attacker with CAP_NET_ADMIN privileges to cause a denial ofservice (DoS) attack due to a refcount overflow.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
